widget.name: KeyStrokes
widget.description: Listens to a key combination in the browser and fires the action of a button.

property.caption: Shortcuts
property.description: These are the key combinations that should the action of the given button.

property.caption: Key Combination
property.description: This is the key combination that should be caught, for example CTRL+S .

property.caption: CSS Selector
property.description: This is the CSS Selector of the element that will receive a Click Event as soon as the corresponding key combination is pressed. When you added the class shortcut-ctrl-s to a button. The CSS Selector becomes ".shortcut-ctrl-s" (without the quotes)
